abstract: Venture capitalists were never very interested in the retail sector, but they are now taking a second look, focusing on a new generation of online retailers and the next wave of technology to help stores optimize how they run their businesses, Reuters writes.

lead_paragraph: Venture capitalists were never very interested in the retail sector, but they are now taking a second look, focusing on a new generation of online retailers and the next wave of technology to help stores optimize how they run their businesses, Reuters writes.

headline.main: Venture Capital Takes a Second Look at Retail
